findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables initialized only in the constructor can be declared as immutable for optimization.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code makes a contract difficult to understand and maintain, increasing deployment and interaction costs.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Variables configured on user-supplied input lack proper zero-value checks, leading to potential problems during execution.
